--- product_code: ls14 description: 10mm German Salvengeschütz (Volley Guns) title: 10mm German Salvengeschütz (Volley Guns) breadcrumb: Salvengeschütz (Volley Guns) name: German Salvengeschütz (Volley Guns) cost: $12.00 paypal_id: PTDT4E5939Y28 ---

Salvo guns were a more advanced version of the the Ribauldequin. They were formed by bundling multiple rifle barrels together to shoot simultaneously or in sequence.

This is a Salvengeschütz (Volley Guns) unit of two volley guns and six crew. You will recieve two volley gun barrels (ls14a), two gun carriages (ls14b), four reinforced spoked wheels (ls_a) and six crew (a mix of ls15a–i).
